attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With fuel prices soaring above the £1 per litre mark, it is time the UK government stopped penalising motorists, by increasing fuel price by almost 100%, with their tax. Without better and cheaper public transport we should not be crippled by a ridiculously large fuel tax, whilst the rest of the world carries on burning fuel at the same rate.
